text: Josuwe ka saraka janin diya wo lɔ ka a kɛ ikomin Allabatala la baaraden Musa ka a fɔ Isirayɛlikailu yɛ ɲa mɛn ma. A ka a lɔ kabakurunilu le la, nɛɛ tun ma se mɛnilu ma fewu ka a lɛsɛ, baa a sɛbɛni ɲa wo le ma Musa la sariya kitabu rɔ. Isirayɛlikailu ka sarakailu janin Allabatala yɛ wo kan ka ii kɛ buuri ri, ka jususuma sarakailu fanan bɔ wo kan.
